attributes.action: We want more help within the NHS mental health services.
attributes.additional_details:
I suffer from mental health problems myself. Being told I'd have to wait a year on physcology if not longer was a shock. I am lucky to have family there to support me but not everyone is that fortunate.

We will be trying to raise money along with this petition so we can make a change. To many are taking their own lives as they feel that's the only option. To many people are loosing loved ones. 
Make the change. Help us in helping others like myself.
attributes.background: Me and my sister want to get a petition up and running for more help within the NHS mental health servies With the NHS being totally strained and over worked there is not enough help available. The government can help with extra funding to these services. Or organising mental health pop ups.
